about_the_game:
Welcome to Gundy, a short and sweet 2D platformer made by d4rkd0s.
Your mission as Gundy is to find a weapon, eliminate the enemy snakes along your path.
Try to find access to the boss room. Once you enter the room prepare for a difficult fight, only those with true skill will win!

Written in 2019, supported today, if you have any ideas/feedback please share on the Steam Community.

Written in 2019, supported today, if you have any ideas/feedback please share on the Steam Community.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 4.x
  • Processor: Any modern
  • Graphics: Any modern
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Modern

name: Gundy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon X1300
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Try to find access to the boss room. Once you enter the room prepare for a difficult fight, only those with true skill will win!
